passive.name: Each Now Has a Role to Play
passive.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer defeats an enemy, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
